result.execSummary:
The defendant Randall James Arndt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Randall James Arndt is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Randall James Arndt was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
May serve time in St. Croix County as long as no cost to Polk County.
Concurrent with: 14CF318 - Count 1.

miscConds.notes: $114.50 fine/costs to be paid to the Clerk of Courts Office - Bond to be applied and remainder to be returned to poster.
Must provide a DNA sample and pay surcharge of $250 - Bond to be applied and remainder to be returned to poster.
May not possess/use firearms or body armor.

May not vote until civil rights are restored.  
May not old elected office.
If not US citizen may face deportation or lose other citizenship rights.
Other rights could be lost until restored.

Subject to Good Time.
Subject to Work Release.
